reviewText: I really enjoyed this a great run of the mill low budget horror movie with a fun storyline
Great story low budget film. I would give it a solid A in the B class movies.

First of all the trailer for this movie is.wrong its an old trailer for another movie with same name um not stupid and to make things worst this new version is the worst move ever made horrible  horrible
If you're a fan of horror films, this one won't leave you disappointed. Good scares and lots of fun moments along the way.
Obviously a low budget flick, but the storyline is great. I thoroughly enjoyed it. I'd recommend it if your looking to be entertained.
If you enjoy a good horror movie this is a movie for you. It's fast paced and has a very good story with just the right amount of fear and blood to keep you on the edge of your seat.

Making a film is a labor of love and you never forget your first one. While any first film with a low budget is not without technical flaws, this film does many things right. The story is solid and for the most part the actors give good performances. Go grab a copy and check it out. Enjoy it for what it is and hopefully we will be discussing the sequel soon.
